verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto them When either man אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> or woman כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יַפְלִא֙ <WH6381> shall separate לִנְדֹּר֙ <WH5087> [themselves] to vow נֶ֣דֶר <WH5088> a vow נָזִ֔יר <WH5139> of a Nazarite לְהַזִּ֖יר <WH5144> to separate לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

מִיַּ֤יִן <WH3196> [himself] from wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <WH7941> and strong drink יַזִּ֔יר <WH5144> He shall separate חֹ֥מֶץ <WH2558> no vinegar יַ֛יִן <WH3196> of wine וְחֹ֥מֶץ <WH2558> or vinegar שֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> of strong drink לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> and shall drink וְכָל־ <WH3605> any מִשְׁרַ֤ת <WH4952> any liquor עֲנָבִים֙ <WH6025> of grapes לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH8354> neither shall he drink וַעֲנָבִ֛ים <WH6025> grapes לַחִ֥ים <WH3892> moist וִיבֵשִׁ֖ים <WH3002> or dried לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> nor eat

כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> All the days נִזְר֑וֹ <WH5145> of his separation מִכֹּל֩ <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> is יֵעָשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> nothing that is made מִגֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> tree הַיַּ֗יִן <WH3196> of the vine מֵחַרְצַנִּ֛ים <WH2785> from the kernels וְעַד־ <WH5704> even זָ֖ג <WH2085> even to the husk לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> shall he eat

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> All the days נֶ֣דֶר <WH5088> of the vow נִזְר֔וֹ <WH5145> of his separation תַּ֖עַר <WH8593> there shall no razor לֹא־ <WH3808> no יַעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> come עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head עַד־ <WH5704> until מְלֹ֨את <WH4390> be fulfilled הַיָּמִ֜ם <WH3117> until the days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַזִּ֤יר <WH5144> in the which he separateth לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> [himself] unto the LORD קָדֹ֣שׁ <WH6918> he shall be holy יִהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become גַּדֵּ֥ל <WH1431> grow פֶּ֖רַע <WH6545> [and] shall let the locks שְׂעַ֥ר <WH8181> of the hair רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> of his head

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> All the days הַזִּיר֖וֹ <WH5144> that he separateth לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [himself] unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> body מֵ֖ת <WH4191> at no dead לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> he shall come

לְאָבִ֣יו <WH1> for his father וּלְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> or for his mother לְאָחִיו֙ <WH251> for his brother וּלְאַ֣חֹת֔וֹ <WH269> or for his sister לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִטַּמָּ֥א <WH2930> He shall not make himself unclean לָהֶ֖ם בְּמֹתָ֑ם <WH4194> when they die כִּ֛י <WH3588> because נֵ֥זֶר <WH5145> because the consecration אֱלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> of his God עַל־ <WH5921> is on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> [is] upon his head
כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> All the days נִזְר֑וֹ <WH5145> of his separation קָדֹ֥שׁ <WH6918> he [is] holy ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יָמ֨וּת <WH4191> And if any man מֵ֤ת <WH4191> die עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> beside בְּפֶ֣תַע <WH6621> very פִּתְאֹ֔ם <WH6597> suddenly וְטִמֵּ֖א <WH2930> by him and he hath defiled רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> the head נִזְר֑וֹ <WH5145> of his consecration וְגִלַּ֤ח <WH1548> then he shall shave רֹאשׁוֹ֙ <WH7218> his head בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day טָהֳרָת֔וֹ <WH2893> of his cleansing בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> on the seventh יְגַלְּחֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1548> shall he shave

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <WH8066> And on the eighth יָבִא֙ <WH935> he shall bring שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> two תֹרִ֔ים <WH8449> turtles א֥וֹ <WH176> or שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> or two בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> young יוֹנָ֑ה <WH3123> pigeons אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> to the priest אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> to the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְעָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> the one לְחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> and the other לְעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering וְכִפֶּ֣ר <WH3722> and make an atonement עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> because מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> for him for that חָטָ֖א <WH2398> he sinned עַל־ <WH5921> because הַנָּ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> by the dead וְקִדַּ֥שׁ <WH6942> and shall hallow אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> his head בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that same day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> same

וְהִזִּ֤יר <WH5144> And he shall consecrate לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days נִזְר֔וֹ <WH5145> of his separation וְהֵבִ֛יא <WH935> and shall bring כֶּ֥בֶשׂ <WH3532> a lamb בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שְׁנָת֖וֹ <WH8141> year לְאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> for a trespass offering וְהַיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> but the days הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <WH7223> that were before יִפְּל֔וּ <WH5307> shall be lost כִּ֥י <WH3588> because טָמֵ֖א <WH2930> was defiled נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> because his separation

וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> And this [is] the law הַנָּזִ֑יר <WH5139> of the Nazarite בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> when מְלֹאת֙ <WH4390> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days נִזְר֔וֹ <WH5145> of his separation יָבִ֣יא <WH935> he shall be brought אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְהִקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> And he shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֣וֹ <WH7133> his offering לַיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כֶּבֶשׂ֩ <WH3532> he lamb בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שְׁנָת֨וֹ <WH8141> year תָמִ֤ים <WH8549> without blemish אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one לְעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering וְכַבְשָׂ֨ה <WH3535> ewe lamb אַחַ֧ת <WH259> and one בַּת־ <WH1323> of the first שְׁנָתָ֛הּ <WH8141> year תְּמִימָ֖ה <WH8549> without blemish לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאַֽיִל־ <WH352> ram אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and one תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> without blemish לִשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> for peace offerings

וְסַ֣ל <WH5536> And a basket מַצּ֗וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread סֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour חַלֹּת֙ <WH2471> cakes בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <WH4886> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּמִנְחָתָ֖ם <WH4503> and their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> and their drink offerings

וְהִקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> [them] before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> חַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> his sin offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5930> and his burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֜יִל <WH352> the ram יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> And he shall offer זֶ֤בַח <WH2077> [for] a sacrifice שְׁלָמִים֙ <WH8002> of peace offerings לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַ֖ל <WH5921> together סַ֣ל <WH5536> with the basket הַמַּצּ֑וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread וְעָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest אֶת־ <WH853> מִנְחָת֖וֹ <WH4503> also his meat offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> נִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering

וְגִלַּ֣ח <WH1548> shall shave הַנָּזִ֗יר <WH5139> And the Nazarite פֶּ֛תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> the head נִזְר֑וֹ <WH5145> of his separation וְלָקַ֗ח <WH3947> and shall take אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂעַר֙ <WH8181> the hair רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> of the head נִזְר֔וֹ <WH5145> of his separation וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> [it] in the fire אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> is under זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> which [is] under the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> of the peace offerings

וְלָקַ֨ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַזְּרֹ֣עַ <WH2220> shoulder בְּשֵׁלָה֮ <WH1311> the sodden מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאַיִל֒ <WH352> of the ram וְֽחַלַּ֨ת <WH2471> cake מַצָּ֤ה <WH4682> unleavened אַחַת֙ <WH259> and one מִן־ <WH4480> out הַסַּ֔ל <WH5536> out of the basket וּרְקִ֥יק <WH7550> wafer מַצָּ֖ה <WH4682> unleavened אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and one וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> and shall put עַל־ <WH5921> on כַּפֵּ֣י <WH3709> [them] upon the hands הַנָּזִ֔יר <WH5139> of the Nazarite אַחַ֖ר <WH310> after הִֽתְגַּלְּח֥וֹ <WH1548> is shaven אֶת־ <WH853> נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> [the hair of] his separation

וְהֵנִיף֩ <WH5130> shall wave אוֹתָ֨ם <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֥ן ׀ <WH3548> And the priest תְּנוּפָה֮ <WH8573> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> this [is] holy הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> for the priest עַ֚ל <WH5921> together חֲזֵ֣ה <WH2373> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֔ה <WH8573> with the wave וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> together שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֑ה <WH8641> and heave וְאַחַ֛ר <WH310> and after יִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <WH8354> may drink הַנָּזִ֖יר <WH5139> that the Nazarite יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> wine

זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> This [is] the law הַנָּזִיר֮ <WH5139> of the Nazarite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יִדֹּר֒ <WH5087> who hath vowed קָרְבָּנ֤וֹ <WH7133> [and of] his offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> according נִזְר֔וֹ <WH5145> for his separation מִלְּבַ֖ד <WH905> alone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to what תַּשִּׂ֣יג <WH5381> shall get יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> beside [that] that his hand כְּפִ֤י <WH6310> according נִדְרוֹ֙ <WH5088> to the vow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִדֹּ֔ר <WH5087> which he vowed כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> so he must do עַ֖ל <WH5921> according תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> after the law נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> of his separation פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and unto his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> On this wise תְבָרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> ye shall bless אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אָמ֖וֹר <WH559> saying לָהֶֽם׃ ס
יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> bless יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD וְיִשְׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <WH8104> thee and keep ס
יָאֵ֨ר <WH215> shine יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD פָּנָ֛יו <WH6440> make his face אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> on וִֽיחֻנֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH2603> upon thee and be gracious ס
יִשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lift up יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> his countenance אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> on וְיָשֵׂ֥ם <WH7760> upon thee and give לְךָ֖ שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> thee peace ס

וְשָׂמ֥וּ <WH7760> And they shall put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name עַל־ <WH5921> on בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> upon the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> and I אֲבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <WH1288> and I will bless פ
